languages.text: Логис Оптикон-22 настаивал, что необходимо отбить священную машину — данное судно строилось много десятилетий, и его разрушение было бы великой трагедией.

traits.locale_text: Логис Оптикон-22 настаивал, что необходимо отбить священную машину — данное судно строилось много веков, и его разрушение было бы великой трагедией.

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Логис Оптикон-22 настаивал, что необходимо отбить священную машину — данное судно строилось много десятилетий, и его разрушение было бы великой трагедией.

traits.locale_text: Logis Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
Logis Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
Logis Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
Logis Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.

languages.text: 统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号坚持要我们夺回这台神圣的机器，因为这台机器的建造工作已经持续了几十年，若是将它在此毁于一旦，这对帝国而言会是场惨痛的悲剧。
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 奥普蒂孔22号坚持要我们夺回这台神圣的机器，因为这台机器的建造工作已经持续了几十年，若是将它在此毁于一旦，这对帝国而言会是场惨痛的悲剧。

languages.text: Le magos dominus Opticon-22 a insisté pour que nous reprenions la machine sacrée : le vaisseau étant en construction depuis plusieurs décennies, sa destruction aurait représenté une tragédie immense pour l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Le Logis Opticon-22 a insisté pour que nous reprenions la machine sacrée : le vaisseau étant en construction depuis plusieurs décennies, sa destruction aurait représenté une tragédie immense pour l'Imperium.

languages.text: マゴスのオプティコン-22は神聖な機械を奪還するよう主張した。この船は何十年も前から作られており、破壊されてしまえば帝国にとって大きな悲劇を意味するからだ。
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: マゴスのオプティコン-22は神聖な機械を奪還するよう主張した。この船は何十年も前から作られており、破壊されてしまえば帝国にとって大きな悲劇を意味するからだ。

languages.text: El Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insistió en que recuperáramos la máquina sagrada, puesto que la nave llevaba décadas en producción y su destrucción supondría una tragedia para el Imperium.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: El Logos Opticon-22 insistió en que recuperáramos la máquina sagrada, puesto que la nave llevaba décadas en producción y su destrucción supondría una tragedia para el Imperium.

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 bestand darauf, dass wir die heilige Maschine wieder einnehmen, denn das Schiff war seit vielen Jahrzehnten im Bau gewesen, und seine Zerstörung hätte für das Imperium eine große Tragödie bedeutet.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Logis Opticon-22 bestand darauf, dass wir die heilige Maschine wieder einnehmen, denn das Schiff war seit vielen Jahrzehnten im Bau gewesen, und seine Zerstörung hätte für das Imperium eine große Tragödie bedeutet.

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, kutsal makineyi geri almamız konusunda ısrarcı oldu. Bu geminin uzun yıllardır imalatta olduğunu ve yok olmasının İmparatorluk için büyük bir trajedi olacağını söylüyordu.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 insisted that we retake the sacred machine, for the vessel had been in the making for many decades, and its destruction would have meant a great tragedy for the Imperium.
